description: The massive tower at the center of Enies Lobby where the final battle between Luffy and Rob Lucci takes place. Contains a central column with underground tunnels below.
significance: The climactic battleground for the Enies Lobby arc's final confrontations.

keyEvents.title: Sogeking Lands at Tower Base
keyEvents.description: After falling from the struck section, Sogeking safely lands at the base of the tower where Zoro and Sanji are located.

keyEvents.title: Column Flooded with Seawater
keyEvents.description: Lucci uses Rankyaku to rupture the wall, flooding the tower's column and underground tunnels with seawater.

keyEvents.title: Gear Third Activated in Tower
keyEvents.description: Luffy activates Gear Third for the first time while battling Lucci inside the flooding tower.

keyEvents.title: Tower Damaged by Gigant Pistol
keyEvents.description: Luffy's Gigant Pistol blows a massive hole through the tower's first column.

statusChanges.description: The tower's first column sustained massive damage from Luffy's Gigant Pistol attack, with a large hole blown through it. The interior was also flooded with seawater from Lucci's Rankyaku attack.

description: The long bridge connecting the Tower of Justice to the Gates of Justice at Enies Lobby. Named for being the last place criminals can hesitate before being sent to their fate.
significance: The pathway to freedom for the Straw Hats and the location where Robin makes her stand with Franky.

keyEvents.title: Franky and Robin Prepare to Fight
keyEvents.description: On the Bridge of Hesitation, Franky and Robin prepare to fight their way past Spandam and the Marines.

keyEvents.title: Lucci Sent Flying Across Bridge
keyEvents.description: The impact of Gigant Pistol sends Lucci hurtling across the entire length of the Bridge of Hesitation to a battleship beyond.

description: The Judicial Island, one of the World Government's three major strongholds. A place where criminals are brought for formal sentencing before being sent to Impel Down or executed.
significance: The primary setting of the Enies Lobby arc and the location of the Buster Call's devastating attack.

keyEvents.title: Buster Call Devastates Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: The Buster Call's ten battleships continue their merciless bombardment, reducing the main island to rubble.

keyEvents.title: Robin Recalls Ohara While Witnessing Destruction
keyEvents.description: Robin witnesses the Buster Call's devastation of Enies Lobby and recalls the same operation destroying Ohara.

statusChanges.description: The Buster Call continues its systematic destruction of Enies Lobby's main island with overwhelming firepower from ten battleships.
